Hero.description: I craft digital experiences that blend minimalist aesthetics with user-centered logic. Currently transitioning from graphic design to building full digital products.

About.title: Experience & Skills
About.description: Hi. My name is Darina Timoshenko, I am a junior designer and illustrator. I have been drawing in the graphic sphere for more than 5 years, and currently, I am expanding into vector art, landing pages, and web development.

job1.title: UX/UI Design
job1.desc: Privately trained in UX/UI design. Mastered tools such as Figma, Adobe XD, and Affinity programs. Created website interfaces, focusing on usability and visual appeal.

job2.title: Graphic Design
job2.desc: Experience in designing logos and branding for different industries. Engaged in content creation for social networks of private businesses.

job3.title: Graphic Drawing
job3.desc: Adobe Photoshop (processing, color correction), Adobe Illustrator (illustrations, logos, banners). Currently switching to Affinity Designer/Photo.
